definitions: A popular video game franchise created by Nintendo, featuring the Italian plumber Mario and his adventures in the Mushroom Kingdom.
The main protagonist of the Super Mario video game series, a short, portly Italian plumber who is known for his jumping ability and his quest to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser.
examples: Super Mario Bros. was a groundbreaking game.
My favorite character in Super Mario is Yoshi.
The Super Mario movie was a box office hit.
